title: Noam Chomsky speaks to Irish anarchists at a private meeting in Dublin 1/4
description:
During his trip to Dublin in early 2006 Noam Chomsky held a private meeting for the Irish anarchist group the Workers Solidarity Movement and their friends.  In the video Chomsky talks about anarchism, the Spanish Civil War, US Imperialism and the Iraq war.

The sound quality of the recording is poor, we recommend you view the version at http://youtu.be/Qj9i5Tocow4 that has subtitles
